name: Brick Game Gallery - PGC Summer Team JAM 2021
name_original: Brick Game Gallery - PGC Summer Team JAM 2021
description:
Made for Pygame Community Summer Team Jam 2021

PROGRAM, GRAPHICS: Kyuchumimo
MUSIC: AdamAudio

DEPENDENCIES:

  • Pygame: pip install pygame
  • NumPy: https://numpy.org/install/

To run the game, you can use Thonny IDE or GNU/Linux shell

  • Thonny IDE: Open PRG.py and press F5 or CTRL+R
  • GNU/Linux shell:~@ python3 /filepath/PRG.py

This game was made with a limited period of time, so it is not complete, certain things need to be polished and only one of the games can be played.

This game was designed to be compatible with TIC-80 in case Pygame was not viable as it did not cover certain needs.

Special thanks to AdamAudio to provide the game with original music!
